title: Prodspace
description: Developed a productivity-enhancing web application using React with features like habit tracker, calendar, etc. Added elements of Gamification like streaks and friends list to maintain a 30-day user retention of 25%. Active Users from over 63 countries within two years of its lifetime.

title: FitLit
description: Developed a fitness and habit tracking mobile app. Provides features including calorie tracker, workout planner, and activity logger. Currently working on adding AI Image recognition to facilitate calorie tracking.
